mechanics.condition: Player chooses to take the Dash action
mechanics.outcome: Player can take the Dash action

mechanics.condition: Expeditious Retreat is active AND Player chooses to take the Dash action
mechanics.outcome: Player can use a Bonus Action to take the Dash action

description_text: This spell allows you to move at an incredible pace. When you cast this spell, and then as a bonus action on each of your turns until the spell ends, you can take the Dash action.
